source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static scenery shot of a vast desert landscape under a bright, hazy sun. Large, rolling sand dunes dominate the view, with a few small palm trees scattered in the distance. The only discernible movement is fine sand being blown across the surface of the dunes by the wind.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: 1. The sand is not the only movement; the leaves of some of the palm trees also shake slightly.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: In addition to the movement of the sand, the leaves of some palm trees also exhibit slight motion.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: In addition to the movement of the sand, the leaves of some palm trees also exhibit slight motion.
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This is a static scenery shot of a vast desert landscape under a bright, hazy sun. Large, rolling sand dunes dominate the view, with a few small palm trees scattered in the distance. The only discernible movement is the fine sand being blown across the surface of the dunes by the wind, along with the slight motion of the palm tree leaves.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a static scenery shot of a vast desert landscape under a bright, hazy sun. Large, rolling sand dunes dominate the view, with a few small palm trees scattered in the distance. The only discernible movement is the fine sand being blown across the surface of the dunes by the wind, along with the slight motion of the palm tree leaves.

generated_critique: In addition to the movement of the sand, several birds can be seen flying low over the dunes.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a static scenery shot of a vast desert landscape under a bright, hazy sun. Large, rolling sand dunes dominate the view, with a few small palm trees scattered in the distance. The only discernible movement is fine sand being blown across the surface of the dunes by the wind, along with several birds flying low over the dunes.
